OOC: It's fun to beat someone up, probably, but I'll wait until someone att=
acks me before breaking their ankles and nose. First ya gotta get them in t=
he testicles, though. That is, if they're a man. If it's a woman, you might=
 have trouble.

Hey, I know how it feels. I'm pretty evil myself. Previousl=
y I was just stupid. It took me a year before I gained the wisdom and respe=
ct of the other RPGers. I had to earn that respect by not sucking. And it t=
ook a while to learn that. Does anyone go back and look at my old posts? Do=
n't make sense, do they?

You're not alone. I also constantly wanted people=
 to just approve of my RPGing style and accept that I was getting better...=
